ESCAPE! Dr. Bazinga has been building and experimenting on robots in his secret lab for years! After years of struggle and torture, the Robot has finally escaped! Help him avoid the robot minions and get away as far as possible from the secret mountain layer!

In a mysterious fantasy land far away, deep in the mountains of the Robot Kingdom, there was a doctor. Gone crazy from the years of frustrated experimentation in the lab, he decided to destroy all his work, his layer, retire to a tropic island. But one robot, the Robot, will not go down without a fight!

Features you'll LOVE:
* Easy to pick up and play!
* Incredibly fun and addicting!
* Collect coins, power ups, and lives to achieve epic high scores!
* Destroy enemies with your high tech laser gun!
* Beautiful graphics you have to see to believe!
* Dramatic music and sounds!
* Play solo or against others with Nextpeer

What are you waiting for? Download it now and try it yourself! It's completely free to play!
